diagram_notes.content:
# Azure App Creation

1. Create a new App Registration in https://portal.azure.com
2. Enter a name, set the Account Type to be `Single tenant`.
3. Add the 'Redirect URL'. This can be found when creating an OAuth Credential in Tines. It's in the format of `https://<tinesdomain>/oauth2/callback`
4. Hit 'Register' to create the app
5. Select 'API Permissions' from the left bar, and choose 'Add Permission'.
6. Select `Microsoft Graph` and `Application Permissions`.
7. Search for and add `Mail.ReadWrite`. This permission is needed to delete mails from the user's mailbox.
8. Save these permissions, and select `Grant Admin Consent for <domain>`. 
9. Select `Certificates and Secrets` from the left bar, and select `New client secret`. Select the expiration time (max 24 months). The token will need to be regenerated after this time. Make a note of this value.
10. Make a note of the Application ID found in 'Overview' on the left bar.

# OAuth Credential

Create a new Credential in Tines with the following values:

1. Type `OAuth 2.0`
2. Client ID: `Application ID` from Azure app registration
3. Client Secret: ` Client Secret` from Azure app registration
4. Scope: `https://graph.microsoft.com/.default`
5. Grant Type: `Client credentials`
6. OAuth URL: `https://login.microsoftonline.com/<O365_TENANT_ID>/oauth2/v2.0/authorize`
7. OAuth token URL: `https://login.microsoftonline.com/<O365_TENANT_ID>/oauth2/v2.0/token`

https://image-uploads.tines.com/microsoft_logo_transparent.png


# Story Overview

This Story is configured to act as a Send To Story. It can be initiated using the StS Action with a specified `mail_id`, and `user_email`.

This Story will search for and delete that mail from the user's mailbox.
